"Optimal Range":
"The following weapons gain a damage boost against targets that are at a particular range:

・Wired Lance and Assault Rifle deal boosted damage against long-range enemies.

・Twin Machineguns deal boosted damage against close-range enemies."

"When you're at optimal range from an enemy, your lock-on marker will turn orange.

Also, when your attacks hit the enemy, they will have an additional purple visual effect."
